JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you prepared to work with information security in a group that works with some of the biggest companies in the world?

“At Stibo we continuously seek to improve our level of information security – not just because we want to protect ourselves, but also because we work with some of the most well-known brands in the world” says CISO Martin Nielsen, Group Risk, Security & Compliance.

We are looking for looking for a new Information Security Officer to work out of our HQ in Aarhus.


This is Stibo
Stibo A/S was founded in 1794 as a printing company to serve the Royal House of Denmark and is still privately held and owned by the Stibo Foundation, whose charter is ensuring the long-term development and survival of the company and contributing to the community. Since 1965, all company profits have been reinvested in the business and in charitable organizations throughout the world. To learn more about the Stibo Group please go to www.stibo.com.

The Stibo Group serves as a central organization interacting with and supporting the subsidiaries in areas like IT, HR, legal, risk management, IT and information security and general compliance tasks.

Stibo Group has 3 subsidiaries with 25+ locations worldwide:

  • Stibo Systems – a globally leading provider of master data management (MDM) and product information management (PIM) solutions
  • Stibo DX – a globally leading provider of content management systems (CMS) and digital asset management (DAM) solutions
  • Stibo Complete – a leading printing company in Scandinavia
     

Being present on 5 continents, reaching from Sydney to Toronto requires us to have a cultural openness, and we consider our colleagues key to our success and together we continue to create a diverse, unique and exciting work environment.


This is Group Risk, Security & Compliance

The Group Risk, Security & Compliance department is responsible for establishing and maintaining a high level of information security throughout the Stibo Group based on our 4 pillars:

  • Risk Management (Enterprise Risk Management, risk assessments etc.)
  • IT and information security (CIS20, security architecture, security tools etc.)
  • Compliance (ISO 27001, SOC 2, internal audits etc.)
  • Privacy (GDPR and other international, regional and national privacy regulations)
     

We are currently 5 people in the Group Risk, Security & Compliance department, working within and across our security pillars, and our new colleague will primarily be supporting the ‘Compliance’ and ‘Risk Management’ pillars, together with other colleagues of the Group Risk, Security & Compliance department.


This is who we are looking for

We are looking for an Information Security Officer to support the processes and controls of the ISMS and information security policies, and work with – and be responsible for – different projects primarily related to risk management and compliance tasks throughout the Stibo Group, incl. implementation of policies, procedures and controls.

“As we continue to strive to meet the ever-increasing security requirements from both internal and external stakeholders, we now find ourselves in need of a new colleague to support our existing and new activities and projects for the organization,” explains CISO Martin Nielsen.

The projects and tasks of our new Information Security Officer may include, but are not limited to:

  • Designing and implementing policies, procedures and controls
  • Maintaining and improving the ISMS
  • Conducting and documenting internal audits and risk assessments
  • Supporting the sales and project implementation processes.
  • Supporting the cloud services from a compliance perspective.
     


We expect that you:

  • Have strong language skills – preferably fluent – in English and possibly Danish
  • You are comfortable working independently, but also in groups and teams – and with colleagues internationally
  • You understand security frameworks, and you appreciate check boxes, processes and workflows
  • Have experience with information security compliance from similar job(s)
  • Have relevant education and/or certifications (e.g. CISA, CRISC, ESL, CISM)
     


We offer:

  • A challenging position, where you as an individual will have a key role in influencing our information security level and service offering to our stakeholders and customers
  • Flexible hours
     

As we are a global organization, we need to support all our colleagues around the world, so the position may require travelling and occasional meetings accommodating other time zones. This also means that we extend the same kind of flexibility towards your needs and everyday life.


Interested?

We invite candidates for interviews on a continuous basis, so please apply through the link down below "Apply online" as soon as possible.

Should you have questions about the position, you are also welcomed to contact CISO Martin Nielsen, Risk, Security & Compliance, on mnie@stibo.com or call +45 2496 9496.

We look forward to hearing from you.
